## Next.js + Tailwind CSS Project

This is a Next.js application with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS setup.

### Project Structure
- Uses App Router (Next.js 13+ routing)
- TypeScript for type safety
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- ESLint for code quality
- Src directory structure for better organization

### Development Guidelines
- Follow React and Next.js best practices
- Use TypeScript for all new components
- Utilize Tailwind CSS classes for styling
- Follow the App Router conventions for routing
- Place components in appropriate directories within src/

### Key Features
- Server-side rendering (SSR)
- Static site generation (SSG) capabilities
- API routes support
- Optimized images and fonts
- Built-in CSS support with Tailwind
